arts.ttl: Clásico buildup, Hearts v Celtic, Arsenal host Crystal Palace and more – matchday live
arts.sum: ⚽ News, previews and discussion before the day’s action ⚽ Sid Lowe on Sunday’s clásico | Email matchday live Arne Slot admitted that Saturday’s defeat by Brentford was “up there” as perhaps the most disappointed he has been in his time as Liverpool manager, and acknowledged that opponents seem to have worked out how to play against them. “Teams have a certain playing style against us, which is a very good strategy to play,” said Slot, “and we haven’t found an answer yet, and that every time going 1-0 down doesn’t really help as well.” Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Arsenal vs Crystal Palace – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: League leaders Arsenal host Crystal Palace at the Emirates Stadium on Sunday, aiming to solidify their position at the top against opponents looking to rediscover their form. The Gunners are riding high after a superb midweek Champions League win against Atletico Madrid. Crystal Palace, conversely, arrive winless in their last three matches after their long […] The post Arsenal vs Crystal Palace – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace man insists they are coming to Arsenal to win
arts.sum: Crystal Palace defender Maxence Lacroix has emphasised that the team always approach matches with the intention of winning, as they prepare to face Arsenal in the Premier League this weekend. The Eagles are coming off a defeat in European competition but have shown in recent months that they remain a challenging side in domestic play, […] The post Crystal Palace man insists they are coming to Arsenal to win appeared first on Just Arsenal News.

arts.ttl: Arsenal targeting Man City shots on target record in Crystal Palace showdown
arts.sum: Arsenal can equal a Premier League defensive record set by Manchester City when they welcome Crystal Palace to the Emirates for Sunday's Premier League London derby.

arts.ttl: Arsenal send major Crystal Palace injury hint after Mikel Arteta update
arts.sum: Arsenal are set to host Crystal Palace in the Premier League on Sunday afternoon, but the Gunners could be without one of their key players after he was spotted missing from the club's training photos

arts.ttl: Adam Wharton reveals how he plans to take on former team-mate Eberechi Eze as Arsenal star prepares to face old side Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Eze has enjoyed a promising start to his time at Arsenal, contributing three assists in his 10 appearances and will look to continue his new side's fine Premier League run against Palace on Sunday.
